p:
The DPPH radical scavenging activity of the essential oil and synthetic standard ASA and BHT are shown in Table 11 and Fig. 3. The IC50 value of the essential oil was found to be 6.13 ± 0.03 mg/mL with the highest inhibition of 93.43 mg/mL. However, this value is much weaker than those of standard BHT and ASA.Table 11
